name: 汪昆立
objective: 選修介紹材料通性、分類與應用，介紹高分子的各種合成方式，並深入高分子生成之聚合反應、反應機構、反應動力學、熱力學、聚合物之材料構造、聚合方法、分子量之測定、分子量分佈以及一般檢測高分子特性之方法，並介紹各種合成條件對高分子性質的影響，並就各種基本性質與結構間的關係做基礎介紹，希望達到讓同學了解高分子材料概念及特性並對高分子材料產生興趣。
schedule:
Course outline
1.	Scope of polymer chemistry
2.	Condensation and other step-type polymerizations
3.	Free radical polymerizations
4.	Ionic and coordination polymerization
5.	Polymerization and depolymerization equilibria
6.	Kinetics of condensation polymerization
7.	Kinetics of free radical polymerization
8.	Kinetics of ionic polymerization
9.	Determination of absolute molecular weights
10.	Secondary methods for molecular weight determination
11.	Relationship between macromolecular structure and properties
scorePolicy:
Grading: Usual Appearance 20%, Middle examination 30%, Final examination 40%, Report 10%, additional points (max 10 points)
Note：There will be severe penalty for being late or not attending the class. The maximum penalty will be the flunk at the end of semester.
materials:
Textbook:
“Contemporary polymer chemistry” 3rd ed., Harry R. Allcock, Pearson Education Inc., 2003
